title: Cookies and Scream
description: Vegan bakery making cookies, cupcakes, muffins, donuts, and brownies that are gluten-free. Uses coconut oil, agave nectar, coconut and rice flours plus a hint of chili in the hot bakes. Also serves hot drinks and milkshakes. Take away or eat at the cookie bar. Previously at Stables Market in London, it opened a permanent cookie bar with onsite kitchen inside the Camden Lock Market, since May 2012.
streetAddress: Unit L1, Dingwalls Gallery, Camden Lock Market
